title: No, Man in This Viral Video is Not Advocate Tehseen Poonawalla
subtitle: A video has been shared on social media claiming that the person giving the speech is advocate Tehseen Poonawala, who has filed a plea in the Supreme Court against the 10% reservation.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
He also talked about Buddhism and teachings of Buddha that were adopted by BR Ambedkar himself.

Another fact that cannot be ignored is that 10% reservation for the economically weaker section within general category was approved by the Union Cabinet on 7 January, 2019.

However, advocate Tehseen Poonawalla did file a petition in the Supreme Court challenging the Centre's decision to grant 10% quota, according to Indian Express.

The Quint tried to contact Rajratna Ambedkar and will update the article with his response.
